about_the_game:
In this era of new technology and magic, digital life and mechanical brain technology bring great convenience and opportunity to mankind.
They have changed the way people live and work, and have prompted some entirely new transformations......
It has a thriving GDP, a thriving trade and logistics industry, and even a lot of magic.
Some monsters have come into this world from other planes.They built companies by human rules and started hiring humans.
None of this is your business.
You just opened the bathroom door and fell here.
Now all you need to do is to find a way home as soon as possible.
......before the world eats you up.

By clicking on various elements on the screen, players can solve the puzzles hidden behind them and gradually explore the story background and deep meaning of the game.
Story mode is the core gameplay of the game.
Players will follow the main story of the game, and gradually solve one puzzle after another.
Each puzzle mirrors the story of the game.
Solving puzzles moves the story forward and gives the player a deeper understanding of the game's worldview and character setting.
Players will face a variety of challenges throughout the game, including finding hidden clues, solving complex mechanisms, and communicating with NPCS to obtain critical information.

After purchasing the game, you can get:
* More level experience: More than 30 puzzle levels will bring you a different visual enjoyment
* Story memory album: In order to review the story, we will make exquisite small rooms and small books to store the CG obtained during the play.
* Important node storage function: you can store your own play records more conveniently!
* More character interaction: More than 10 new monster characters, some character drawing upgrades!
* Multi-ending Exploration: Your choices will affect the progress and ending of the game. Each ending has its own story and meaning.
* Multi-language support: In order to meet the needs of players, the game text supports English and Chinese, so that players can play the game more freely.

content_descriptors.notes:
The characters in the game are all adults.
Some of the ending text contains hints of the character's death, with depictions of bullying, murder, and suicide.
The official version may contain disturbing images such as high-speed shaking and bloody scenes.
